description: Write the nonprime positive integers on labels in numerical order, forming an infinite sequence L. Now consider the succession of single digits of A000040 (prime numbers): 2 3 5 7 1 1 1 3 1 7 1 9 2 3 2 9 3 1 3 7 4 1 4 3 4 7 5 3 ... (A033308). This sequence gives an arrangement L that produces the same succession of digits, subject to the constraint that the smallest unused label must be used that does not lead to a contradiction.
